hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Volatility Spike Contagion (SOL Focus)
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL experiences a single-day price move >±15% on above-average volume, and the overall crypto market regime is NEUTRAL or BULL, select altcoins (AVAX, GRT, PEPE) will experience elevated volatility (absolute daily returns >8%) within the next 2 trading days, providing long volatility opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: SOL has become a key sentiment and liquidity proxy for altcoins. Extreme moves in SOL often trigger volatility contagion as traders reprice risk across the altcoin complex and hedging activity increases.
entry_conditions: Enter long volatility positions on AVAX/GRT/PEPE at next open

exit_conditions.take_profit: Target volatility capture of 1.5x initial volatility premium
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Altcoin volatility remains subdued (<5% daily move) for 2 consecutive days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL volatility spikes fail to transmit to other altcoins (>70% of altcoins show <6% moves) in more than 30% of cases.
